about-text-1: Star-Tracking was born out of frustration about how complex sports events were. Vestibulum id ligula porta felis euismod semper. Donec ullamcorper nulla non metus auctor fringilla. Aenean eu leo quam. Pellentesque ornare sem lacinia quam venenatis vestibulum. Duis mollis, est non commodo luctus, nisi erat porttitor ligula, eget lacinia odio sem nec elit.
about-text-2: Star-Tracking now has more than 16,000 members and provides a robust online platform for sports organizers so that the organizer can quickly and easily create an online registration system.
about-text-3: All Star-Tracking members on the other hand are informed about the sport events, can register, manage their events, consult their times, and exchange information with friends.

Van kleine events tot sportwedstrijden m: From small events to sports competitions with thousands of participants, from simple running competitions, to complex multi-laps events and multi sport events, we can manage them all!
StarTracking leverde met gerichte commun: With targeted communication in their network about our event, star tracking gave us 20% more participants than the previous edition. Definitely the right choice for us!
Onmiddellijk na de wedstrijd waren alle: All results in our 41 age and group categories were available immediately after the race, making the prize ceremony very smooth
De deelnemers kunnen de uitslagen en aan: Participants can follow the results and number of laps live on their smartphone, which is a great added value for a 24h MTB race
Door de professionaliteit van StarTracki: Because of the professionalism of star tracking, we did not hesitate long to turn them on for the time registration of the BK Half marathon

Vul dit formulier in en vertel ons wat j: Fill out this form and tell us what you are up to. We'll contact you as soon as possible and discuss which solutions best fit your event.
Als u uw paswoord vergeten bent, kunt u: If you forgot your password, you can ask Star-Tracking to reset it for you.
Om na te gaan dat u zelf deze aanvraag s: To verify you are sending this request, we will ask you for a confirmation by mail.
Vul hieronder uw email adres in waarmee: Please enter your email address you use to log in with, en push to button to request a password reset.
U zal dan binnen enkele minuten een Star: Within a few minutes, you'll receive a Star-Tracking email containing a link.
Als u op deze link klikt, zal u uw paswo: If you click this link, you'll confirm your request and your password will be reset.
U hebt zonet aangegeven dat u uw paswoor: You have just indicated that you have forgotten your password and you can confirm your identity via the link in the mail.
Via de knop hieronder kan u nu uw paswoo: Via the button below you can now reset your password and this new password will be sent to your email address. You can log in again and then change your password via the 'My Account' option.
